projects.title: All Projects
projects.subtitle: Complete Portfolio Overview
projects.description: Explore my complete project portfolio, covering from current commercial work to personal experiments and first experience.

ovogene-catalog.description: Developed a web platform catalog of donor materials for medical clinics. Created a system with multi-brand support, each with its own design and settings. Implemented a complex search, filtering and order management system with a full cycle from creation to delivery.
highlights: Role and permission system with detailed authorization

mijnzetel.description: Developed a cross-platform application for political news and polls. Created a system with iOS, Android and Web support on a single codebase. Implemented authentication, voting system, news feed and content management through Firebase.

mobile-laundry.description: Developed from scratch a cross-platform mobile application for a dry cleaning service. Created an order system with logistics service integration, two-factor authentication and push notifications. Implemented B2B and B2C segmentation with different registration flows.
mobile-laundry.note: Project name hidden due to NDA

admin-laundry.description: Maintained and developed an administrative panel for managing a dry cleaning service. Worked with existing Vue.js architecture, added new features for order management, integration with logistics services and notification system.
admin-laundry.note: Project name hidden due to NDA
highlights: Maintenance and development of Vue.js application

driver-passenger-app.description: Conducted migration of a web application from Vuetify to Quasar Framework and split a single codebase into several separate cross-platform applications (Web, iOS, Android). Each application now contains one brand. Implemented a trip booking system, user profile management and multilingual support.
driver-passenger-app.note: Brand names hidden due to NDA
highlights: Migration from Vuetify to Quasar Framework
Splitting single codebase into several applications

driver-passenger-admin.description: I maintain and develop a comprehensive administrative panel for managing a transportation ecosystem. I work with existing Vue.js architecture, add new features for managing trips, drivers, passengers and a complex pricing system. The admin panel supports multi-brand architecture for managing all brands.
driver-passenger-admin.note: Brand names hidden due to NDA
highlights: Maintenance and development of Vue.js application
Complex trip and status management system
Multi-brand architecture for managing all brands
Role and permission system (admin, support, finance)
Google Maps integration and analytical charts

driver-passenger-pdf-generator.description: I laid out all HTML templates for generating PDF invoices with multi-brand support. I configured API endpoints for generating various types of invoices. I worked with an existing Node.js microservice, created a multi-brand architecture with different templates for each brand and implemented internationalization.
driver-passenger-pdf-generator.note: Brand names hidden due to NDA
highlights: HTML template layout for PDF generation
API endpoint configuration for various invoice types

chartertickets.description: Maintained and developed an existing flight booking system with integration of 30+ airlines. Worked with modular architecture on Yii2 Framework, integrated two new partners into the system, maintained API for partners and promo code system. The system included multi-currency, affiliate program and asynchronous order processing.
highlights: Maintenance and development of existing system
Integration of two new partners into the system
Work with modular Yii2 Framework architecture
API support for partners and promo code system
